titleStmt.title: A treatise of the Church VVritten against them of the separation, commonly called Brownists. Wherein the true doctrine of a visible Church is taught, and the Church of England, proued to be a true Church. The Brownists false doctrine of the visible Church is conuinced; their shamefull peruerting of the holy Scriptures discouered, their arguments to proue the Church of England a false Church answered.
titleStmt.author: Darrel, John, b. ca. 1562.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse streete,

notesStmt.note: Dedication and preface signed: Iohn Dayrell.
The author's name is spelled 'Dayrell' both times it appears, and possibly he is a different man from the exorcist.--STC.
Some print show-through; some pages stained.
